item.title: Long-Term Image and Video Editor for Amazon Products - Upwork
item.description:
Bayview Development and Management, based in New York, is seeking a proficient freelance image and video editor for a long-term engagement. Our immediate need involves editing images and videos for our two lighting models, 4" and 6". We estimate around 2-4 hours of editing per model.

Responsibilities:
- Enhance image quality, ensuring high resolution and professional appearance.
- Add elements to images to highlight product features.
- Create engaging product videos showcasing functionality and design.
- Maintain consistency and brand standards across all visual content.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in image and video editing.
- Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, or similar software.
- Attention to detail and creativity in presenting products.
- Ability to meet deadlines and work efficiently.

Compensation:
- $7 to $15 per hour, based on experience and expertise.

If you are passionate about creating visually appealing content and are looking for a long-term collaboration, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 14:07 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Product Photography, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Product Photography, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: France
click to apply

In addition, I need assistance in refining my logo to give it a more professional and polished look. This project requires attention to detail and a strong eye for design. Strong communication skills are also essential to ensure that the project is completed to the highest standard. item.title: Video Editor To Remove Some Writing in The Background of 2 videos - Upwork
item.description:
I have 2 videos.
In each video there is some writing on a machine in the background which needs hiding so it is not visible.

You can not crop the video to remove it so you need to mask the writing without it being visible that you have done so.

The videos are 1 minute each and the text is visible for around 10 seconds on each video

Budget: $20

item.title: Video Content Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We have a couple of long format videos that we'd like to cut into multiple short Video clips for Instagram and TikTok stories. Video will need pre-and-post graphics and be cut in logical ways that we can intersperse other content between then and still make sense when they're posted.

As an agency, we have multiple ongoing projects. This is one of many and will be our first chance to work together.

To be considered for this opportunity please stick to the following instructions:

- Include RED & BLUE VIDEO in your response. Failure to do so will show you did not read this and cannot follow basic instructions.

- Do not attempt to contact us off of upwork or we will report you to their security team for harassment and see to it that you are banned from future opportunities with us.

- Showcase examples of your video editing work that includes graphics, text, etc.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 13:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Mathematicians who know how to do simple video editing - Upwork
item.description:
Hi There

We have many hundred hours of math tutorial videos. Each tutorial video is 1h 45 min long. However, during this tutorial, 12-15 math questions are being taught.

We have an online math question portal but we need the video clip for each question to be cut / cropped and uploaded into the portal for each question.

Only basic editing skills is required. You just need a simple video editing software and no special effects required.

This project may take many weeks.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 13:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Mathematics
Skills: Video Editing, Mathematics
Country: Singapore

item.title: ~Video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor Needed for YouTube Channel (1-Month Trial)

Are you a talented video editor with a passion for creating engaging YouTube content? Join our team!

About Us:
We are a law firm company focused on supporting expats in moving to Portugal (www.freshportugal.com) . We aim to enhance our YouTube presence and need a skilled video editor to bring our content to life.

Key Responsibilities:
Edit and produce high-quality YouTube videos.
Add graphics, effects, and music to enhance videos.
Ensure videos align with our brand and message.
Meet deadlines and manage multiple projects.
Requirements:
Proven experience in video editing (portfolio required).
Proficiency with editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Creative mindset and attention to detail.
Strong communication and time management skills.

What's in it for You:
Competitive pay for the trial period.
Opportunity for long-term collaboration based on performance.
Work remotely with a dynamic team.
How to Apply:
Submit your proposal on Upwork with:

A brief overview of your experience.
Links to your portfolio or previous work.
Your availability during the trial period.

Please give us a quote for a month trial.

Ready to make our YouTube content shine? Apply now!

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 24, 2024 13:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.description:
We have some video footage (outdoor, shot on a mobile phone) that we want to try in a project we're working on. We're trying to create a feel/tone but we haven't nailed down the details of the look we're going for. Possibly something like one of these:
https://www.behance.net/gallery/198480413/Taboga-photo?tracking_source=curated_galleries_photography
https://www.behance.net/gallery/197699403/JUNTA-IS-NOT-YOUR-FRIEND?tracking_source=curated_galleries_photography

We're looking for a video editor that can turn some styling/lighting/color correction options around in a day or two.  Please respond only if you're available to work on this today or tomorrow.

item.title: Portrait Photo Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there! I am searching for a skilled Photoshop editor who specialises in portraits. Specifically, I require someone who can remove blemishes, tone down dark circles under the eyes, enhance the subject's appearance against the background, and remove any unwanted objects in the background. I need to edit stray hair and make it look natural without appearing cut out. These are some of the editing requirements I may request.

I send video instructions to my editors, so it's important that you have a strong understanding of English.

The payment is negotiable. The first job is 1 dollar for one edited photo. This will increase after the first job depending on communication, time delivery and quality of work!

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 24, 2024 13:23 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop Elements, RAW, TIFF, PSD, Photo Editing, Photo Retouching, Adobe Photoshop, Image Editing, Photo Manipulation
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop Elements, RAW, TIFF, PSD, Photo Editing, Photo Retouching, Adobe Photoshop, Image Editing, Photo Manipulation
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Facebook Ad Video Redesign - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor to redesign a video that will be used for Facebook ads. The current video needs a fresh and modern look to better engage our target audience. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing and a strong understanding of Facebook ad requirements. This project involves:

- Redesigning the existing video to make it more visually appealing and attention-grabbing
- Adding captions, text overlays, and other graphic elements to enhance the message
- Optimizing the video for Facebook ad specifications, including format and duration

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Graphic design
- Knowledge of Facebook ad requirements
- Attention to detail

This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who can deliver high-quality results within the given timeframe.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 24, 2024 13:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Facebook, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Facebook, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing
Country: Spain
click to apply
